title: Puro

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At the start of the game, receive the abilities and attributes of a Latex. You cannot receive Yuin's card. You cannot transfur anyone. Abilities that requires a transfur are unlocked immediately.

desc:
Post 2917
*"This one's always been weird. Often on its own and hunting knowledge. Weird. Although on a test it performed that's normally used to get kids here, it passed. Strange, perhaps we could look into him further" -Dr.█████, MIT.*
